name: Heavens' Tea Party
description:
This is our Game entry for the Short and Sweet Jam, 

The game is about a clumsy angel that was in charge to bring the tea bags for the tea party and ended dropping them on hell. Now she has to collect all the 10 bags before she drops out from heaven.

We are testing the prototype of a procedural system with this game. If you want to see it developed even further show some love to the game. 

We hope you enjoy it ^_^ /
